description: The Global High Resolution Daily Extreme Urban Heat Exposure (UHE-Daily), 1983-2016 data set contains a high-resolution, longitudinal global record of geolocated urban extreme heat events and urban population exposure estimates for more than 10,000 urban settlements worldwide for 1983-2016.
title: UHE-Daily

providers.name: NASA Socioeconomic Data and Applications Center (SEDAC)
